name: The 5th International Conference on Education, Psychology and Society
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF) , International Conference on Education, Psychology and Society (ICEEPS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of education, psychology, society and beyond. 2017 ICEEPS will take place from January 19-21, 2017 in Hokkaido, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://iceeps.org/ or contact: iceeps@iceeps.org
